<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="v_plugin"> <v_plugin action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>inactive</active> <available_version>1.0.0</available_version> <definition><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <plugin id="com.snc.facilities_service_automation.move" name="Facilities Move Management" state="published" help="Administering_Facilities_Service_Automation" version="1.0.0" onload_demo_data="load_demo_data.js" licensable="true" provider_name="ServiceNow">
<requires> <import plugin="com.snc.facilities_service_automation"/> </requires>
<description>Facilities Move Management. This plugin enables single user move functionality as well as Enterprise Move and move planning functionality. Any floor plan aspects are not installed by default. Please install the visualization workbench to use the floor plan</description>
<extension point="com.glide.ui.ng" name="mptProcessor" class="com.snc.move_planning_tool.MptProcessor" /> <extension point="com.glide.ajax.processors" name="MptAjaxProcessor" class="com.snc.move_planning_tool.MptAjaxProcessor"/>
</plugin>
]]></definition> <description>Facilities Move Management. This plugin enables single user move functionality as well as Enterprise Move and move planning functionality. Any floor plan aspects are not installed by default. Please install the visualization workbench to use the floor plan</description> <has_demo_data>true</has_demo_data> <help>http://docs.servicenow.com/?context=Administering_Facilities_Service_Automation</help> <id>com.snc.facilities_service_automation.move</id> <licensable>true</licensable> <name>Facilities Move Management</name> <path>plugin://com.snc.facilities_service_automation.move/</path> <provider>ServiceNow</provider> <requires>com.snc.facilities_service_automation</requires> <scope>global</scope> <state>published</state> <supports_rollback>false</supports_rollback> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_created_on> <sys_id>cilities_service_automation.move</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_updated_on> <trackable>true</trackable> <type/> <version>1.0.0</version> </v_plugin> </record_update>
